It’s hard to explain, but it felt really dizzying when I was wearing them. Like in one eye, I could see the reflection of my Vent, but in the other eye I couldn’t. And then for my digital screens in my car, in one eye, it was really dark and in the other, it was fine. I found that if you rotate the lenses, it gets better but they will eventually rotate again.  I suppose you get what you pay for but these sunglasses often give me a headache
